verses.text: \w A|strong="G1487"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*: \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w desire|strong="G1937"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w office|strong="G1984"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* bishop, \w he|strong="G1487"\w* desireth \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w It|strong="G1510"\w* behoveth \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* bishop \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* blameless, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, sober, \w prudent|strong="G4998"\w*, \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w good|strong="G1510"\w* behaviour, chaste, given \w to|strong="G1163"\w* hospitality, \w a|strong="G1510"\w* teacher,

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* given \w to|strong="G3943"\w* \w wine|strong="G3943"\w*, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* striker, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* modest, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* quarrelsome, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* covetous, \w but|strong="G0235"\w*

\w One|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* ruleth \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w subjection|strong="G5292"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* chastity.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w to|strong="G5100"\w* rule \w his|strong="G2398"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G2316"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w take|strong="G1959"\w* \w care|strong="G1959"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w a|strong="G3361"\w* neophyte: \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* being puffed \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* pride, he \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G2443"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w*: \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w reproach|strong="G3680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w snare|strong="G3803"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Deacons|strong="G1249"\w* \w in|strong="G4183"\w* like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w* chaste, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* double tongued, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given \w to|strong="G4183"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* greedy \w of|strong="G1249"\w* filthy lucre:

\w Holding|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* proved: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w them|strong="G3778"\w* \w minister|strong="G1247"\w*, having no crime.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w* chaste, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slanderers|strong="G1228"\w*, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* sober, \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w deacons|strong="G1249"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G3624"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*: \w who|strong="G3588"\w* rule \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* houses.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1438"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* purchase \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* degree, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* thee, \w hoping|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* thee \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* tarry long, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou mayest \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* thou oughtest \w to|strong="G2443"\w* behave thyself \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w pillar|strong="G4769"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ground \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* evidently \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w appeared|strong="G3708"\w* unto \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, hath \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w taken|strong="G0353"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.
